div.head: Description of changes for 2012.10
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. The current version represents a copy from the diplomatic transcription of the St. Victor text. After a comparision collation of manuscript witnesses, and the completion of the Sorbonne Ttranscription corrections and additions will be made. Citations, cross-references, and critical apparatus all still need to be constructed.
